RapidAPI

This website was made usingÂ React, Redux, and Rapid API. When an article's link is pasted into this website, a summary of the article is provided. Additionally, for the user's future reference, the history of the summarised article is stored in the browser's local storage.

# Final Version

To visit the website, [click here.](https://article-summarizer-ss.netlify.app)
